A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Likely inspired by the WW2 aerial fights used in the rough cut of A New Hope\, Rian brings us a bombing run at the film's start to try and push back the First Order.

The theme of this film is about letting go of the past in order to move forward.  A reminder to the audience not to hold nostalgia so tightly as to resist change.

Our heroes make costly choices and audiences are left with polarizing opinions over some of the creative choices made by its direction.
